name: Fire Bolt
description: You hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object within range.

name: Ray of Frost
description: A beam of blue-white cold energy streaks toward a creature. It also reduces the target’s speed by 10 feet.

name: Shocking Grasp
description: Lightning springs from your hand to deliver a shock. The target can't take reactions until its next turn.

name: Burning Hands
description: Each creature in a 15-ft cone must make a Dex save or take fire damage.

name: Magic Missile
description: You create three glowing darts of magical force. Each dart hits a creature you choose.
damage: 1d4+1 force per dart (increases +1 dart per spell level)

name: Thunderwave
description: A wave of thunderous force sweeps out from you. Creatures must make a Con save or take damage and be pushed back.

name: Scorching Ray
description: You create three rays of fire and hurl them at targets within range. Each ray requires a separate ranged spell attack.

name: Shatter
description: A sudden loud ringing noise painfully intense erupts from a point you choose, damaging creatures and objects in a 10-foot radius sphere.

name: Aganazzar’s Scorcher
description: A line of roaring flame 30 feet long and 5 feet wide blasts out from you in a direction you choose.

name: Fireball
description: A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose, erupting into a 20-foot-radius explosion of fire.

name: Lightning Bolt
description: A stroke of lightning blasts out in a 100-foot long, 5-foot wide line from you. Each creature in the line must make a Dexterity saving throw.

name: Melf’s Minute Meteors
description: You create six tiny meteors that orbit you. You can hurl them on your turns to explode on impact.

name: Ice Storm
description: Hailstones rain down in a 20-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder. Terrain becomes difficult for 1 round.

name: Wall of Fire
description: You create a wall of fire up to 60 feet long and 20 feet high, which deals damage to creatures near it or within it.

name: Cone of Cold
description: A blast of cold air erupts from your hands. Each creature in the area must make a Constitution saving throw.

name: Immolation
description: A creature bursts into flames and continues to burn each round unless extinguished.

name: Chain Lightning
description: A bolt arcs from one creature and then jumps to up to three others. Each must be within 30 feet of the previous target.

name: Sunbeam
description: A beam of radiant light blinds and damages creatures in its path. You can create a new beam every turn.

name: Delayed Blast Fireball
description: You place a tiny glowing bead. The longer you wait, the more powerful the explosion becomes.
damage: Starts at 12d6 fire + 1d6 for each round delayed

name: Fire Storm
description: Sheets of fire fill a 10-foot cubes pattern that you arrange, causing damage to those caught inside.

name: Sunburst
description: Blinding light in a 60-foot-radius explodes, damaging and potentially blinding creatures.

name: Incendiary Cloud
description: A roiling cloud of smoke and flame fills the area, damaging creatures inside it.

name: Meteor Swarm
description: Four massive meteors fall, each exploding in a 40-foot radius. Massive devastation ensues.

name: Power Word: Kill
description: If a creature has 100 hit points or fewer, it dies instantly with no saving throw.
